channel.title: Tom Waits on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tom Waits on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tom Waits Pays Tribute to Playwright-Director Robert Wilson: ‘His Vodka Paintbrush of Absurdity, Vaudeville, Heartbreak and Forgiveness and Imagination of the Infinite… Still Astounds’
item.description: Whenever Tom Waits and his wife and longtime collaborator Kathleen Brennan pay tribute — or write seemingly anything — it is in the unique tone that has been a hallmark of his and their creative work
